name: FixnZip Zipper Repair Slider
description: Fix drafty sleeping bags, leaky rain jackets or broken tent zippers. These replacement sliders adjust with thumbscrews for fast, permanent repairs without tools or sewing. Keep one of each size in your repair kit to become a trip-rescue legend.Compatible with all types of zippers, including coil, plastic, metal, invisible and waterproof styles.Check the back of an existing slider for a number between 1 and 10. 1-4 is Small. 5-7 is Medium. 8-10 is Large.You can also measure the width of the teeth or coil. 1-4.5mm is Small. 5-7.5mm is Medium. 8-10mm is Large.
